title: A new video shows how to create a lightweight and debloated Windows 11
An Approach to Lazy Loading Custom Elements
description: Inspired by a colleague’s experiments, I recently set about writing a simple auto-loader: Whenever a custom element appears in the DOM, we wanna load the corresponding implementation if it’s not available yet.

title: Blazing fast PWAs with SEO power using SvelteKit and Ionic
description: This blog aims to show you how to set up a fast, SEO-optimized landing page that allows users to install a PWA, optimized for performance by Lighthouse standards, utilizing SvelteKit and Ionic’s UI components made capable by ionic-svelte.

title: Container queries land in stable browsers
description: With container queries you can query the styling information of a parent element, such as its inline-size. With media queries, you could query the size of the viewport, container queries enable components that can change based on where they are in the UI.
